com.google.glass.samples.waveform

Class WaveformActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.google.glass.samples.waveform.WaveformActivity

  • public class WaveformActivity
extends Activity
    An activity that receives EDA input from the Q-sensor and displays a visualization of that data as a waveform on the screen.
    Author:
    Javier Hernandez Rivera Adapted functionalities by @author Adrian Jimenez-Galindo

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  WaveformActivity.RecordingThread
      A background thread that receives data from the sensor and sends it to the waveform visualizing class.
